name: Eddie Zhang
body:
### About
Eddie Zhang is a medical student at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai in New York, NY. He is also the Chief Operating Officer of [Progressive Health Partnership](http://www.proghealth.org). He is passionate about technology and [lifehacking](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Life_hacking) and brews beer in his spare time. Eddie received a B.A. in English from Duke University in 2010.

### Brewing Adventures
* Coming soon.
